text:
─ Interview's over.
Thank you very much!

Good job, Haruki.
It went pretty well, didn't it?

I was completely absorbed... But I feel like the
interviewer was really good at guiding the conversation.

No, no, it's because you did your best, Haruki.
The interviewer praised you too.

─ I just felt like I had to express my feelings properly,
even if just for a moment.

Otherwise... in such an amazing world,
I might disappear in an instant...
All I have is that feeling right now...

─ It's not just that.
Haruki... you have a lot more.
